documents.document: @AmandaMcVitty Thank you! flights were fine. Just didn't get much sleep. A nap and a walk in the sunshine seems to have helped though.
Kia ora Wellington. So very tired but I made it safely #anza17
@AmandaMcVitty @KB_Neal I might be going a bit long, but I have an entertaining slide show. Which I'll need, since my paper is at 8:30am!
@AmandaMcVitty @KB_Neal Just a warning, since I now only have 2 papers in my panel on Fri, I'm speaking for 25 mins. No big hooks please⏱️
@_MattFirth_ Sadly no. Will try again this weekend. A few days away from my paper should hopefully give me fresh eyes.
@AmandaMcVitty but seriously. I'm seeing these more and more often. It's just not right!
@AmandaMcVitty magic beans
Kind of hoping Malcolm Turnball will respond to the bully Mr Trump like this: https://t.co/T7SI4idU0f

Finally finished season 1 of Luke Cage - first half of the season was much stronger than the second half. Overall I enjoyed it.
@handonthepulse I'm hoping for Rory Kinnear as the Doctor, or Adrian Lester - someone with a background in theatre.
@handonthepulse especially since their experiment to attract the younger demographics back, the series 'Class', appears to have failed
@handonthepulse all speculation atm, but highly likely - will increase ratings (in certain demos) + the money that BBC makes from franchise
@handonthepulse apparently the bookies favourite is Ben Whishaw. A queer Doctor!
No! Wanted to see him tackle non-Moffat Who 😔😫 https://t.co/8jgBHCFf2d

@ablackwell89 @richard_third live Tweeting his own funeral is the reason I started following his account. Absolutely hilarious!
@_MattFirth_ Mine's too long as well. Currently 4000 words and I am still not finished writing. Good luck editing it!
This conference sounds great: "Shakespeare, Technology, Media, Performance". I will be sad to miss it: https://t.co/SLYpjAPbRa
@tout_moi happy to find someone who shares my research interests!
@ablackwell89 please tell me you're including the most excellent Twitter-feud between @richard_third and @KngHnryVIII
@ablackwell89 oh? in relation to fandom?
@ablackwell89 looking forward to reading it! Anything on Richard III, or comics/graphic novels? My research https://t.co/7SjoP2If7R
Just read @ablackwell89 's fantastic article "Shakespearean Actors, Memes, Social Media" - so relevant to my work on #RichardBatch

@tout_moi Just sent in a proposal for Association of Adaptation Studies Conference. Put in a good word for me and I might see you in Sept ;)
@Helen_Jess officially creeped out
@handonthepulse well I was planning on heading to London at some point this year, so I gather you'll be coming with me? ;)
@attentive not a fan of Macbeth?

Quite enjoyed Assassin's Creed - not nearly as bad as reviewers have been making it out to be. Saw a few parallels with Kurzel's Macbeth
